column3: The basic thing a man should know is how to change a tyre and how to drive a tractor. Whatever that bearded dude is doing on the Dos Equis beer commercials sets the bar. That's your guy. Every man should be aiming to be like him. The beard is just the tip of the iceberg.

Change is inevitable. Change for the better is a full-time job.
In a progressive country change is constant; change is inevitable.
